about.title: About This Project
about.paragraph1: As a Moroccan, I've always been passionate about preserving and sharing the beauty of Darijaâ€”the dialect that connects millions of us to our roots, our families, and our culture.
about.paragraph2: When I started working on AI training projects, I quickly realized there was a major gap:
about.highlight: there were no quality, free Darija translators available online.
about.paragraph3: The few that existed were either inaccurate, expensive, or both. This was frustrating not just for my work, but for anyone trying to learn or communicate in Darija.
about.paragraph4: So I decided to build my own. This tool was born out of necessityâ€”a way to train AI models with accurate Darija translations while also creating something useful for travelers, language learners, and the Moroccan diaspora.
about.paragraph5: My goal is simple: make Darija more accessible to everyone. Whether you're visiting Morocco for the first time, reconnecting with your heritage, or just curious about the language, I hope this translator helps bridge the gap.
